briefdescription.para: Generate candidates for line feature.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to an array of candidates, will be filled by generated candidates
a pointer to the line

briefdescription.para: Generate candidates for line feature, by trying to place candidates as close as possible to the line's midpoint.

detaileddescription.para:
Candidates can "cut corners" if it helps them place near this mid point.
lPos
pointer to an array of candidates, will be filled by generated candidates
mapShape
a pointer to the line
initialCost
initial cost for candidates generated using this method. If set, cost can be increased by a preset amount.
the number of generated candidates

briefdescription.para: Generate candidates for line feature, by trying to place candidates towards the middle of the longest straightish segments of the line.

detaileddescription.para:
Segments closer to horizontal are preferred over vertical segments.
lPos
pointer to an array of candidates, will be filled by generated candidates
mapShape
a pointer to the line
the number of generated candidates

memberdef.argsstring: (double x, double y, QList< LabelPosition *> &lPos, double angle)
